doc.title: Blood Promise
doc.plot: RJ is a man who blames himself for his pregnant wife's death. He deals with fits of drunken depression and suicidal rage on a daily basses. His life no longer makes any sense to him and he is consumed with hate and resentment toward God, people and most of all himself. When a young African American couple, Darrel and Yvette, move in next door he takes his anger out on them. Darrel gets combative and over protective of his wife, but Yvette is moved with compassion for the grieving man. As she sets out to try to help him regain control of his life it causes serious problems in her own marriage. She finds her self going against the man who loves her to try and help a man who hates her. The tension grown until something must give.
